functionDecorators.name: applyLiquidationDiscount
functionDecorators.description: Apply the liquidation bonus to a balance as a discount.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the balance on which to apply to liquidation bonus as a discount.

functionDecorators.name: calculateHealthFactor
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the healthfactor of a debt balance.

parameterDecorators.name: _collateralValue
parameterDecorators.description: value of the collateral in stableX currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _vaultDebt
parameterDecorators.description: outstanding debt to which the collateral balance shall be compared.

functionDecorators.name: isHealthy
functionDecorators.description: Check if the health factor is above or equal to 1.

parameterDecorators.name: _collateralValue
parameterDecorators.description: value of the collateral in stableX currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _vaultDebt
parameterDecorators.description: outstanding debt to which the collateral balance shall be compared.

returnDecorators.description: boolean if the health factor is >= 1.

functionDecorators.name: liquidationBonus
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the liquidation bonus for a specified amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount for which the liquidation bonus shall be calculated.

returnDecorators.name: bonus
returnDecorators.description: the liquidation bonus to pay out.
